alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Grundy; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:58AM CDT until June 15 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Black Hawk County in northeastern Iowa... Tama County in central Iowa... Southeastern Grundy County in central Iowa... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Reinbeck to 6 miles north of Toledo to near Meskwaki Casino, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Tama, La Porte City, Traer, Reinbeck, Dysart, Meskwaki Casino, Gladbrook, Le Grand, Garwin, Montour, Clutier, Elberon, Beaman, Lincoln, Morrison, Vining, Tf Clark State Park, Union Grove State Park and Toledo Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
